block.comment: All the resets: Makes sure that the sprite is not here when it shouldn't be/cleans up graphic effects.
Changes your attire when your health drops down to zero (and thus fail the "midterm"). The boss and the Game code will reactively say somethings.
Press A, S, D to switch between attack upgrade, speed upgrade and durability upgrade. You cannot do so while you are debuffed. Unfortunately my attempt to use abstraction on all three failed.

I have already upgraded my attack!
Do I really want to switch to attack upgrade? Press V to confirm, X to cancel.

block.comment: The main game code, including a tutorial mode and the actual game. Different statistics, max health, active items, shields and difficulty are set here.

block.l: Welcome to Dogfight 10: the pilot's midterm! Do you want to go to the review session (it's really recommended)? 1. Yes. Anything else. No
Choose your difficulty: 1. Stanfurd celtic studies final. 2. CS10 quest. 3. CS61A 2nd midterm.

block.comment: I tried using the "copy of" block here but did not work.

block.l: Choose your plane's upgrade: 1. Durability 2. Attack 3. Speed You can always switch during the game by pressing A/S/D, but be careful of the enemy's response.

block.comment: activates your active items according to the costume of "Game code", which is on the right lower corner of the screen and will be there throughout the game.
The shield. After the wait you are shielded for 10 seconds, during which time the damage dealt to you is decreased unless the enemy uses artillery.
The power attack. After the wait your attack damage and bullet size are increased for 10 seconds.
The nuke power. After the wait you stop shooting until you press C to release the powerful nuke attack

custom-block.comment: The heal power. After the wait you heal for an amount according to an algorithm.

block.l: You have no active items of this sort!

block.comment: This determines how long the debuff (aka. slow, disarm etc.) lasts on you.
reacts to your health reaching 0 or the boss' health reaching 0. Calculates your "score and letter grade" if you win and gives you an F if you lose.

custom-block.comment: The bullet algorithm, which uses a simple recursion to make it shoot infinitely until other sprites/blocks tell it to stop. Reacts to boolean "Is enemy shielded?" and adjusts damage.

block.l: And now allow me to invite some more of my elite troops to join the party!
BORING!! I will give you a treat just in case you die too fast.

custom-block.comment: creates 3 clones to make a total of 4 bullets that will aim at you.
testing my health regen block: taking in current health, regeneration amount and maximum health, returning the smaller amount of regeneration amount vs max health-current health

block-definition.comment: LABEL will stamp text on the stage at the given font size. The direction of the text is the direction the sprite is facing, and color will match the pen color.

block.l: var stage = this.parentThatIsA(StageMorph), context = stage.penTrails().getContext('2d'), rotation = radians(this.direction() - 90), trans = new Point( this.center().x - stage.left(), this.center().y - stage.top() ), isWarped = this.Warped, len, pos; if (isWarped) {endWarp(); } context.save(); context.font = size + 'px monospace'; context.textAlign = 'left'; context.textBaseline = 'alphabetic'; context.fillStyle = this.color.toString(); len = context.measureText(text).width; trans = trans.multiplyBy(1 / stage.scale); context.translate(trans.x, trans.y); context.rotate(rotation); context.fillText(text, 0, 0); context.translate(-trans.x, -trans.y); context.restore(); pos = new Point( len * Math.sin(radians(this.direction())), len * Math.cos(radians(this.direction()))); pos = pos.add(new Point(this.xPosition(), this.yPosition())); this.gotoXY(pos.x, pos.y, false); this.changed(); if (isWarped) {this.startWarp(); } stage.changed();

block.l: Welcome to your review session! You can always press 1 to start the midterm and skip review session!
(For god's sake go to your review session, kids.)
I will review with you to the different aspects of the midterm!
First, press arrow keys to move around.
Shooting is automatic, you do not have to control it.
What you do have to control are your active power ups and your upgrades.
Press Space to activate your power ups!
Awesome! You have activated your shield, which will protect you from a large portion of enemy damage.
Be wary that all power ups require 8 seconds to be readied
Now press X to switch to your other power up!
Nice! This is your power attack. Power attack makes your bullet deal more damage and increases its size for 10 secon

You have two more power ups: the nuke (double hollow circle) that will shoot a powerful missle that deal massive damage after you press C, and heal (cross) that would heal you for a portion of your health.
You will have access to 3 of each power up in the beginning of the game, but you will be able to pick up a random one after you take down an enemy (that is, if you can catch it).
Press Z to check how many power ups you have
You also have access to 3 different upgrades in the beginning of the game: attack, speed and durability (health). You can only choose one, and the chosen stat will be increased greatly.
You can change your upgrade in game by pressing A for attack, D for durability and S for speed, and then press V to confirm and X to cancel.
You cannot change your upgrade while you are being disarmed or slowed.
Now let me explain the difficulties.
As the difficulty becomes higher, your health and damage becomes lower, the enemies' health, damage, attack speed and accuracy etc. become higher They also become harder to hit.
There will be health bars to indicate how many more hits you can take. Usually there will be two, and the lower one indicates your health while the upper one indicates the enemy's.
In problem 4, there will be an extra health bar on the top of the screen to indicate the boss's health
You enemy has 5 forms: normal, artillery, shield, thin man and vampire. The latter 4 each counter a specific power up you have.
Artillery penetrates your shield, shield nullifies your power attack, thin man can dodge your nuke faster than others, and vampire steals the health that you just healed.

He also possesses specialized weapons to go against your upgrades, which will disarm you (decrease your attack damage) when you upgrade your attack, slow you for speed upgrade and deal damage according to your max health for durability upgrade.
As the difficulty becomes higher, the enemies will respond to your power ups/upgrades quicker.
Alright that's pretty much it. Good luck in your actual midterm! Press 1 if you want to do the review session again or start the midterm.
GOD DAMN IT THOSE USELESS TROOPS!
*cough, cough, cough* Well well well, looks like you have defeated my elite squad.
That makes you at least worthy of being killed by me!
STOP LAUGHING AT MY FACE! BLAME IT ON WHOEVER DREW ME!!
*cough, cough, cough* Anyways, let's see how many seconds you could last before you DIE!!
AHAHAHAHA! Bow to the power of my imperial troops!

block-definition.s: draw health bar at y pos: %'y'
deduct health bar at y pos: %'y' with health percentage %'percentage'

block.l: Welcome to your midterm for Dogfight 10, pilot!
I was about to give you the normal midterm, but the aliens are sending out troops to invade us, so instead this will be your test.
This midterm has 4 problems. For the first three, you will be facing increasing amount of enemy troops, and the 4th will be the boss.
Good luck, pilot, and may the curve be ever in your favor.
Ah, that's sad. Unfortunately this means you have gotten an F for this midterm.
It's too late to P/NP so good luck on your next one...
Congratulations, you have passed your midterm!

list.l: That should have been a solid
, but thanks to massive grade deflation, your actual letter grade is

block.l: Every year, thousands of Cal Golden Bears fall under the big boss of midterm.
Good luck to everyone, and may the curves be ever in your favor!
*cough, cough, cough* Well, that was easy. Back to reviewing for my next midterm. Villain Speaks 1B is definitely hard.
NOOOOO!! THIS IS ONLY THE 2ND MIDTERM FOR MY VILLAIN FIGHT 61A COURSE!!! I'M DEFINITELY NOT PASSING MY FINALS AT THIS RATE!!!
It's also too late to P/NP. MOM!!!
Oh my, thank you for saying that! You are different from other earthlings: you are an actual good person!
I guess we are in this together in a way. We can be friends!
Wow! When I pass my midterm, someone else is failing it.
The boss might be a villain, but he's a midterm taker, just like me.
Hey boss *pats him on the back*, you have done your best, if you keep your effort up you can definitely pass your final!
Preparing the nuke takes an extra 2 seconds!
I am debuffed, I cannot switch!

block-definition.comment: This block takes in a function and two "sets" of items. The first are the INPUTS to the function. These must be a list whos length is equal to the number of inputs in the function. The OUTPUTS should be the same type as the output of the function. There must be the same number of inputs and outputs.

block.l: ERROR: The number of tests must be the same for inputs and outputs.
